text: Nice park with lots of play facilities so good for families. Play facilities cater to kids of all ages. The Macdonaldâ€™s nearby is always crowded during weekends as well due to its convenience and proximity to West Coast park.  The big grass field in West Coast Park allows for many sport events such as soccer, frisbee, softball, etc to be played by many participants and also attracts kite flyers.  Cyclists are a plenty here too
Excellent playground for the kids with several zones of play area. Ample car park and McDonald's inside.
Evening hustle bustle at the park after the morning rain was expected and enjoyed the walk with the friend especially the view at the pier.
Quite a numbers of children play structures. Cons are some structures are under maintenance or repair.
West coast Park is the most natural place I feel happy when I go there every time more than 20 years I always there
